com.facebook.buck.parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends Object
    High-level build file parsing machinery. Primarily responsible for producing a ActionGraph based on a set of targets. Also exposes some low-level facilities to parse individual build files. Caches build rules to minimise the number of calls to python and processes filesystem WatchEvents to invalidate the cache as files change.

      • parseBuildFilesForTargets

        public ActionGraph parseBuildFilesForTargets(Iterable<BuildTarget> buildTargets,
                                    Iterable<String> defaultIncludes,
                                    BuckEventBus eventBus,
                                    Console console,
                                    ImmutableMap<String,String> environment)
                                      throws BuildFileParseException,
                                             BuildTargetException,
                                             IOException,
                                             InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        buildTargets - the build targets to generate an action graph for.
        defaultIncludes - the files to include before executing build files.
        eventBus - used to log events while parsing.
        Returns:
        the action graph containing the build targets and their related targets.
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException
        BuildTargetException
        IOException
        InterruptedException

public TargetNode<?> getTargetNode(BuildTarget buildTarget)

      • buildTargetGraph

        public TargetGraph buildTargetGraph(Iterable<BuildTarget> toExplore,
                           Iterable<String> defaultIncludes,
                           ProjectBuildFileParser buildFileParser,
                           ImmutableMap<String,String> environment)
                             throws IOException
        Build a TargetGraph from the toExplore targets. Note that this graph isn't pruned in any way and needs to be transformed into an ActionGraph before being useful in a build. The TargetGraph is useful for commands such as AuditOwnerCommand which only need to understand the relationship between modules.

        Note that this method does not cache results. Call either this or buildActionGraphFromTargetGraph(TargetGraph) in a single BuildEngine execution.

        Parameters:
        toExplore - the BuildTargets that TargetGraph is calculated for.
        defaultIncludes - the files to include before executing build files.
        buildFileParser - the parser for build files.
        Returns:
        a TargetGraph containing all the nodes from toExplore.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • parseBuildFile

        public List<Map<String,Object>> parseBuildFile(Path buildFile,
                                      Iterable<String> defaultIncludes,
                                      ProjectBuildFileParser buildFileParser,
                                      ImmutableMap<String,String> environment)
                                        throws BuildFileParseException,
                                               BuildTargetException,
                                               IOException
        Parameters:
        buildFile - the build file to execute to generate build rules if they are not cached.
        defaultIncludes - the files to include before executing the build file.
        environment - the environment to execute the build file in.
        Returns:
        a list of raw build rules generated by executing the build file.
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException
        BuildTargetException
        IOException

      • filterAllTargetsInProject

        public ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> filterAllTargetsInProject(ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
                                                  Iterable<String> includes,
                                                  RuleJsonPredicate filter,
                                                  Console console,
                                                  ImmutableMap<String,String> environment)
                                                    throws BuildFileParseException,
                                                           BuildTargetException,
                                                           IOException,
                                                           InterruptedException
        Populates the collection of known build targets that this Parser will use to construct an action graph using all build files inside the given project root and returns an optionally filtered set of build targets.
        Parameters:
        filesystem - The project filesystem.
        includes - A list of files that should be included by each build file.
        filter - if specified, applied to each rule in rules. All matching rules will be included in the List returned by this method. If filter is null, then this method returns null.
        Returns:
        The build targets in the project filtered by the given filter.
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException
        BuildTargetException
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • targetsInProjectFromRoots

        public ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> targetsInProjectFromRoots(ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> roots,
                                                  Iterable<String> defaultIncludes,
                                                  BuckEventBus eventBus,
                                                  Console console,
                                                  ImmutableMap<String,String> environment)
                                                    throws BuildFileParseException,
                                                           BuildTargetException,
                                                           IOException,
                                                           InterruptedException
        Traverses the target graph starting from roots and returns the BuildTargets associated with the nodes for which the filter passes. See RuleJsonPredicates.matchBuildRuleType(BuildRuleType) for an example of such a RuleJsonPredicate.
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException
        BuildTargetException
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • onCommandStartedEvent

        public void onCommandStartedEvent(BuckEvent event)
        Called when a new command is executed and used to signal to the BuildFileTreeCache that reconstructing the build file tree may result in a different BuildFileTree.

      • onFileSystemChange

        public void onFileSystemChange(WatchEvent<?> event)
                        throws IOException
        Called when file change events are posted to the file change EventBus to invalidate cached build rules if required. Paths contained within events must all be relative to the ProjectFilesystem root.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • recordParseStartTime

        public void recordParseStartTime(BuckEventBus eventBus)
        Record the parse start time, which should include the WatchEvent processing that occurs before the BuildTargets required to build a full ParseStart event are known.

      • getParseStartTime

        public Optional<BuckEvent> getParseStartTime()
        Returns:
        an Optional BuckEvent timestamped with the parse start time.
